title: EconomicResource
description: Anything useful, including goods, work, ideas, currency - even good will

resourceClassifiedAs.description: The hash of the ResourceClassification that defines the type of this resource

underlyingResource.description: The hash of a more concrete EconomicResource upon which this resource is based.

contains.description: The hash of an EconomicResource that contains this resource

trackingIdentifier.description: Something like a batch or serial number

owner.description: The hash of an Agent that can use, trade, sell, or share this Resource
owner.$comment: This is a stand-in until custodianship is defined in ValueFlows

name.description: A simple name, not necessarily unique

url.description: A URL where additional information can be obtained

image.description: A URL that points to an image of the object
